sense.def:
Then
pomeni v določenem času v preteklosti ali prihodnosti.

seg.quote: I'm going to see him at lunchtime. He's busy till then.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
then
pokažemo, da se ena stvar zgodi ali pojavi za drugo.

seg.quote: He went to the village school, then to the grammar school, and then to the university.

sense.def:
Izraz
then
uporabimo v pogovoru, da svojo izjavo povežemo s pravkar povedanim.

seg.quote: ‘Are you a student?’—‘No, I'm not’—‘What do you do then?’

sense.def:
Z izrazom
then
tudi uvedemo povzetek ali sklep tistega, kar smo povedali, ali pa z njim končamo pogovor.

seg.quote: Democracy, then, is a form of government.
If any questions do occur to you, then don't hesitate to write.

sense.def:
Izraz
then
uporabljamo tudi za izrazi, kot so
now
,
well
in
okay
, da poudarimo tisto, kar bomo rekli takoj v nadaljevanju.

seg.quote: Now then, it's time you went to bed.

sense.def:
Izraz
then
uporabljamo na začetku stavka ali za besedama
and
in
but
, kadar želimo uvesti dodaten podatek.

cit.quote: vendar pa, toda po drugi strani

seg.quote: Then there could be a tax problem.
Iron would do the job much better. But then you can't weld iron so easily.
